column5: I just flicked over to see Forrest Gump .showing on WFN ... well according to my daughter it is actually relevant because he worked on a shrimp boat ....NOT !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!  Is it just me ???
Don't miss "Mans Favorite Sport" if they show it!!!... a true fishing classic!!!
Meh   I think we should start producing 10-15 minute shorts so they can air them....call it the "Put up or Shut up Hour"
